qas.question: When was he appointed Apostolic Delegate to Turkey and Greece?
He was appointed titular archbishop of where?
What ws he known by in the Turkish community?
When did he take that position?
Who did he introduce Bulgarian pilgrims to?
When was Pope Pius XI appointed Apostolic Delegate to Turkey and Greece?
Where was Pope Pius XI named a titular archbishop?
What title is Pope Pius XI known by in Turkey?
When did Pope Pius XI take his position in Turkey?
Who did Pope Pius XI used his office to save?

context: <b5_0>On <a0_0>30 November 1934<b5_0/><a0_0/>, he was appointed Apostolic Delegate to Turkey and Greece and titular archbishop of <a1_0><b6_0>Mesembria, Bulgaria<b6_0/><a1_0/>. Thus, he is known as <b7_0>"<a2_0>the Turcophile Pope<a2_0/>,"<b7_0/> by the Turkish society which is predominantly Muslim. Roncalli took up this post in <a3_0><b8_0>1935<b8_0/><a3_0/> and used his office to help the Jewish underground in saving <b9_0>thousands of refugees in Europe<b9_0/>, leading some to consider him to be a Righteous Gentile (see Pope John XXIII and Judaism). In October 1935, he led Bulgarian pilgrims to Rome and introduced them to <a4_0>Pope Pius XI<a4_0/> on 14 October.
